function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density in big cities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and reduce social contacts","Technologies":"Urban policy regulations and enforcement","People":"Residents of highly populated cities","Owner":"City policymakers and health authorities"},{"Description":"Reproductive number (R) greater than 1","Impact":"Potential for epidemic spread","Mitigation":"Reduce social contacts and enforce lockdown measures","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance and contact tracing","People":"Population in affected areas","Owner":"Health authorities and local governments"},{"Description":"Second wave of COVID-19 in different cities","Impact":"Increased cases and hospitalizations","Mitigation":"Implementation of indefinite partial lockdown and strict urban policymaking","Technologies":"Urban policy regulations and enforcement","People":"Residents of affected cities","Owner":"Local governments and health authorities"}]}
